english.segment1: Joy will come in the morning. Riding on the wings of the dawn. I know. Joy will come after mourning. As surely as You are God
english.segment2: Joy will come believe. Joy will come joy will come
english.segment3: Joy will come like the harvest. Reaping for tears that we sow. I know. Joy will run to the farthest place. Surely as You are God
english.segment4: What is this hope I feel. It's helping
english.segment5: What is this peace beyond. Understanding. You fix the broken heart. There's healing in Your wings
english.segment6: What is this whisper small. I'm hearing. So far above it all. It's speaking. You're still the sovereign Lord. There's healing in Your wings
